body:
Comment 1 by **wwaites**: 
From IRC:

17:46 < wrtp> here's an example: https://gist.github.com/837326

17:46 < wrtp> this allocates double the memory necessary

17:47 < wrtp> if you take out the first range statement, it uses only the
necessary memory

17:47 < wrtp> it'd be worth raising as an issue
